name: uExcelerate
description: uExcelerate is a pioneering Leadership Development Platform that is committed to democratizing coaching across all levels in an enterprise. Our aim is to help professionals and organizations unleash their full potential through personalized coaching, robust team relationships, and strong internal coaching culture. uExcelerate are proud to announce that we are the recipients of the prestigious ET HCA 2022 award for Startup of the year and Technology solution provider of the year. Symphony, Our AI-powered SaaS platform is designed to enable organizations to scale coaching solutions and build sustainable coaching cultures that foster personalized leadership development for all employees. It can be white labeled by organizations to roll out their internal and external learning programs, enabling easier monitoring and analytics of the coaching/ mentoring/ training programs ongoing in the organization.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline:
Unified Leadership Development Platform
 Unleash employee potential to accelerative growth
ShortDescription: uExcelerate is a pioneering Leadership Development Platform that is committed to democratizing coaching across all levels.

Highlights.name: Enabling organizations to build capable Leaders
Highlights.description: At uExcelerate, our research team at the Applied Coaching Science and Leadership Lab works rigorously to develop academically sound models and frameworks. Our goal is to assist you in building and scaling your coaching culture, cultivating exceptional leaders at every level of your organization.

Highlights.name: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion
Highlights.description: Foster a workplace where employees feel valued, free to be themselves, and secure, irrespective of differences, promoting a culture of equity and inclusivity.

Highlights.name: Accelerating performance
Highlights.description: Helping you to create a high performing, driven and energetic workforce that breaks barriers

enhanced_description: uExcelerate is a pioneering, award-winning Leadership Development Platform that leverages AI-powered SaaS to democratize and scale coaching across all levels within an enterprise. The platform, named Symphony, is designed to help professionals and organizations unleash their full potential through personalized coaching, foster robust team relationships, and build a strong, sustainable internal coaching culture. It can be white-labeled, enabling organizations to easily roll out, monitor, and analyze their internal and external learning, mentoring, and training programs. uExcelerate's approach is grounded in rigorous academic research from its Applied Coaching Science and Leadership Lab, ensuring the development of sound models and frameworks. The platform was recognized with the prestigious ET HCA 2022 award for 'Startup of the year' and 'Technology solution provider of the year', and is committed to fostering Diversity, Equity & Inclusion while accelerating overall organizational performance.
key_use_cases: Democratizing coaching across all organizational levels
Providing personalized leadership development for all employees
Building and scaling sustainable coaching cultures
Rolling out internal learning, mentoring, and training programs
Rolling out external learning, mentoring, and training programs
Monitoring and analyzing coaching, mentoring, and training program effectiveness
Developing capable leaders at every organizational level
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
Fostering a more diverse and inclusive workforce
Accelerating overall organizational and individual performance

Awarded ET HCA 2022 'Startup of the year' and 'Technology solution provider of the year'
Research-backed methodology through the Applied Coaching Science and Leadership Lab (academically sound models and frameworks)
Focus on Coaching Science and Coaching Psychology
